commands.statement: SELECT ME.EntityNo , ME.EntityID , ME.EntityName , ME.Acronyms , ME.Comment , ME.CreatedMemberNo , (SELECT (S.MemberName || ' ' || S.PositionName || ' [' || S.DepartmentName || ']') FROM Member S WHERE S.MemberNo = ME.CreatedMemberNo) AS CreatedMemberName , strftime('%Y-%m-%d', ME.CreatedAt) AS CreatedAt , ME.ModifiedMemberNo , (SELECT (S.MemberName || ' ' || S.PositionName || ' [' || S.DepartmentName || ']') FROM Member S WHERE S.MemberNo = ME.ModifiedMemberNo) AS ModifiedMemberName , strftime('%Y-%m-%d', ME.ModifiedAt) AS ModifiedAt FROM MetaEntity ME WHERE ME.DeletedAt IS NULL AND ME.ApplicationNo = @ApplicationNo ORDER BY ME.CreatedAt;

SELECT MF.EntityNo , MF.FieldID , MF.FieldName , MF.FieldType , CASE WHEN MF.PK = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS PK , CASE WHEN MF.IX = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS IX , CASE WHEN MF.UI = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS UI , CASE WHEN MF.NN = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS NN , CASE WHEN MF.AI = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS AI , MF.MaxLength , MF.DefaultValue , MF.Comment , MF.SortingNo FROM MetaField MF WHERE MF.EntityNo = @EntityNo ORDER BY MF.SortingNo , MF.FieldID;

INSERT INTO MetaEntity ( ApplicationNo , EntityNo , EntityID , EntityName , Acronyms , Comment , CreatedMemberNo , CreatedAt ) VALUES ( @ApplicationNo , @EntityNo , @EntityID , @EntityName , @Acronyms , @Comment , @CreatedMemberNo , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );
UPDATE MetaEntity SET DeletedAt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , ModifiedMemberNo = @ModifiedMemberNo WHERE DeletedAt IS NULL AND EntityNo = @EntityNo;
SELECT ME.SeedData FROM MetaEntity ME WHERE ME.DeletedAt IS NULL AND ME.EntityNo = @EntityNo;

statement.if: UPDATE MetaEntity SET EntityID = @EntityID , EntityName = @EntityName , Acronyms = @Acronyms , Comment = @Comment , ModifiedMemberNo = @ModifiedMemberNo , ModifiedAt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE DeletedAt IS NULL AND EntityNo = @EntityNo;

statement.desc: 데이터 모델 필드 정보 입력 또는 변경, 삭제
statement.if: INSERT INTO MetaField (EntityNo , FieldID , FieldName , FieldType , PK , IX , UI , NN , AI , MaxLength , DefaultValue , Comment , SortingNo ) SELECT @EntityNo , @FieldID , @FieldName , @FieldType , CASE WHEN @PK = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END , CASE WHEN @IX = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END , CASE WHEN @UI = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END , CASE WHEN @NN = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END , CASE WHEN @AI = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END , @MaxLength , @DefaultValue , @Comment , @SortingNo WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MetaField WHERE EntityNo = @EntityNo AND FieldID = @FieldID);

UPDATE MetaField SET FieldName = @FieldName , FieldType = @FieldType , PK = CASE WHEN @PK = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END , IX = CASE WHEN @IX = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END , UI = CASE WHEN @UI = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END , NN = CASE WHEN @NN = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END , AI = CASE WHEN @AI = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END , MaxLength = @MaxLength , DefaultValue = @DefaultValue , Comment = @Comment , SortingNo = @SortingNo WHERE EntityNo = @EntityNo AND FieldID = @FieldID;
DELETE FROM MetaField WHERE EntityNo = @EntityNo AND FieldID = @FieldID;
